interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: DEROL Eyeshadow Stick Sets 12 Colors，Long Lasting Glitter Eye Brightener Eyeliner Sticks,Cream to Powder Waterproof Eye Makeup,Eyeshadow Capsules Crayon,Shimmer Eye Shadow Pencils (12 Colors/Box) Review Date: 2021/05/24 Store: DEROL Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DEROL', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream,Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '715962598334'} Review Text: I was really excited to receive these little eyeshadows. They are small and compact, which makes them easy to pack and travel with. The colors are pretty and while not super pigmented at to begin with they are buildable and blend well. I tried them with eye primer and with out and they lasted the same for me. I will say I have oily eyelids and noticed that they don't last more than a couple hours.
I think these would make a great gift for adults, teens, or even younger kids who want play makeup. My daughters who are 6 and 7 found them one day and loved using them. They especially loved the blue and purple that they said made them look like a mermaid. They are super fun and priced fairly so I would say give them a try! Review Title: Compact and easy application Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay Huxley {'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} This mask is one my favorite clay masks that I've tried. It so gentle on the skin and hardly any scent to it. It's not too thick and easily applied in a thin layer. It exfoliates well and leaves my face feeling clean and visibly brighter after the first use. I was also pleasantly surprised that my face didn't feel dry after and it actually felt moisturized. A little goes a long way and it's well worth the price. The packaging is beautiful and looks like a luxury item. This would make a great gift! Will absolutely be buying this again when this tube is finished. They are small and compact, which makes them easy to pack and travel with. The colors are pretty and while not super pigmented at to begin with they are buildable and blend well. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor skincare, particularly clay masks for gentle exfoliation and brightening effects; has recently ventured into eye makeup, showing interest in vibrant and playful options.
- **Skin Type:** Sensitive skin, maintaining a strong preference for hypoallergenic and non-irritating formulations across both skincare and makeup products.
- **Key Features Valued:** Effective cleansing, moisturizing properties, and easy application remain crucial, alongside a growing appreciation for versatility in makeup. Aesthetically pleasing packaging continues to be significant, reflecting a preference for items that are gift-worthy. 
- **Consumer Behavior:** Shows a willingness to repurchase high-quality skincare items. Recent interest in makeup indicates a broader exploration of beauty products, especially those that are compact and travel-friendly; a focus on value is also evident in the choice of products that are fun and accessible. 
- **Satisfaction Level:** High satisfaction with products tailored to personal needs; positive reviews illustrate a tendency to appreciate both performance and fun in products, with an emphasis on buildable quality, manageable longevity, and suitability for multi-age use.

**Trends:** Strong commitment to effective skincare rituals is complemented by an emerging engagement with playful, easy-to-use makeup, indicating an evolving beauty regimen that balances practicality and enjoyment.
